sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row>
      <!-- Lista de Projetos -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title>Projetos</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <project-list :projects="projects" />
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Tarefas -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="6">
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title>Tarefas</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <task-card v-for="task in tasks" :key="task.id" :task="task" />
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Formulário de Nova Tarefa -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title>Nova Tarefa</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <new-task-form @add-task="addTask" />
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
        <v-card class="mt-4">
          <v-card-title>Novo Projeto</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <new-project-form @add-project="addProject" />
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import TaskCard from '../components/TaskCard.vue';
import NewTaskForm from '../components/NewTaskForm.vue';
import NewProjectForm from '../components/NewProjectForm.vue';
import ProjectList from '../components/ProjectList.vue';

export default {
  name: 'ProjectDashboard',
  components: {
    TaskCard,
    NewTaskForm,
    NewProjectForm,
    ProjectList
  },
  data() {
    return {
      projects: [],
      tasks: []
    };
  },
  methods: {
    addTask(task) {
      this.tasks.push(task);
    },
    addProject(project) {
      this.projects.push(project);
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Adicione qualquer estilização adicional aqui, se necessário */
.mt-4 {
  margin-top: 16px;
}
</style>
